ISSUE.TITLE: Fix all the API controllers decorated with [Authorize(AuthenticationSchemes = "Api")] to return ChallengeOrForbid("Api")
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Most of the OC API controllers are configured to use the "Api" scheme for authentication, but return `ChallengeOrForbid()`, that ultimately uses the default challenge scheme (which is typically the cookie handler when the Users module is enabled). To fix that, the API controllers must be updated to do `ChallengeOrForbid("Api")` instead of `ChallengeOrForbid()`, so that challenges are properly handled by OpenIddict when the OpenID token validation feature is enabled. /cc @deanmarcussen @OrchardSkills
